metadata.title: CVE-2015-8078 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the index_urlfetch function in imap/index.c in CyrusIMAP 2.3.19, 2.4.18, and 2.5.6 allows remote attackers to have unspecifiedimpact via vectors related to urlfetch range checks and the section_offsetvariable. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2015-8076.

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd-2.4 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
